biotools.summary: Database for prokaryotic two-component systems (TCSs). It annotates and classifies TCS proteins from completely sequenced prokaryotic genomes and metagenomes. TCS complements can be browsed by metagenome, replicon or sequence cluster (and these genesets are available for download by users).
